title: America Gets a Lifetime Appointment to Brett Kavanaugh News | Bill Gates
itunes:title: America Gets a Lifetime Appointment to Brett Kavanaugh News | Bill Gates
description:
Spotify announces curated playlists based on customers' DNA, Brett Kavanaugh faces a third sexual misconduct allegation, and Bill Gates discusses Goalkeepers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
